resources.string: The signer name hasn\'t been updated
You can only add air-gapped and software signers via this mobile app. If you need to add a wired signer, please do so via our desktop Nunchuk app.
Use Nunchuk as a software signer
The software signer is managed by the app.
Please ensure to do the following things
Follow your vendor\'s instruction on how to set up a device with a seed.
Please enter the PIN to unlock the device. You might also need to enter a PASSPHRASE on-device, if PASSPHRASE is enabled.
The private keys for this signer are stored and encrypted locally on this device. Please keep your device safe to prevent your signer from being compromised.
Please take a moment to write down this mnemonic phrase. It’s your backup, you can use to restore wallet on another device.
Never share recovery phrase with anyone. Without it you won’t be able to access your account. Avoid having a digital copy.
Please enter the seed words recovery mnemonic phrase. Separate each word with a single space only (No commas or any other punctuation)
Passphrase can be anything you want, and add extra security to your signer. COPY TBD
Please backup your passphrase along with the seed. You need both to recover your signer.
It is not recommended for the software signers to have complete control of the wallet. Software signers are not as safe as hardware signers. Are you sure you want to proceed?
It is recommended for the hardware signers to have complete control of the wallet. Software signers are not as safe as hardware signers. Are you sure you want to proceed?
